review: Love it.  Bought 2, one for the main TV, one for a bedroom.  Both TV's are HD.Added so much to the families viewing.Programmed the smart phones, iPad and Kindle to do the Chromecast.We were viewing Netflix via Wii and that was ok, but with Chromecast we pull HD off of a DSL line.Fantastic HD resolution and very, very little buffering.One downside, now need TV controller, DVD, etc and now another device for Chromecast.Smart app would be a single device to control the TV, VCR, DVD and coffee pot

review: Works really well.  Does everything as advertised.  The only issue is that it's not quite obvious that you can't "chromecast" web pages from a tablet/phone.
